front.title: Session Initiation Protocol (SIP): single registration for Multiple Address of Record (AoR) reachabiliTy InformatioN, with FedeRated Intra ENterprise Domain name Setup

abstract.t: The Martini Working Group is defining a mechanism for SIP IP-PBX type devices to REGISTER and obtain SIP service for E.164-based Address of Records. In doing so it has selected a solution that is not compatible with the solution that was specified in ETSI TISPAN and 3GPP for subscription based business trunking. The latter solution not only covers E.164 numbers but also handles non-E.164 numbers and alphanumeric AOR's. This document defines a extension of the martini mechanism that allows it to be used also with ETSI TISPAN and 3GPP standard subscription based business trunking arrangements.
